subject: Sports Medicine
Baseball
lead_paragraph: It is hard to imagine that Joba Chamberlain will avoid the disabled list after being scratched from his next start and sent to meet with an orthopedic surgeon after tests on his shoulder.
snippet: It is hard to imagine that Joba Chamberlain will avoid the disabled list after being scratched from his next start and sent to meet with an orthopedic surgeon after tests on his shoulder.
